title: Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Lake Shore with Trees and DIstant Mountains", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: At left in foreground, a small hill with one dark tree. At right in foreground, extending back and to the left, a body of flat water. On the water, at right in midground, a small island. In distance at right, large mountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Rough Sketch of Lake Shore with Trees and DIstant Mountains", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-40.
